text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    429577009Patient advocate (person)
    116154003Patient
    133932002Caregiver
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 223366009 (Healthcare professional)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 224930009 (Services)

name: ParticipantRoles
title: Participant Roles
description: Roles of participants that may be included in a care team.  Defined as: Healthcare professional (occupation) or Services (qualifier value).
